MAIN_MESSAGE: The following information is for customers from the EH21 postcode area of Musselburgh ONLY.  We had no advance warning of the power issues and only became aware of it at 12.40PM. Our next available engineer will be attending site to investigate and our team will work to get your power supply back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.45PM. Please speak to us if you are aware of any damage to the network or if this information does not apply to you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.50PM on 15 November 2020.
